job.title: Data Scientist(Machine Learning,Python)
job.description: <p><strong>Job Description:</strong></p><p><br></p><p>&nbsp;</p><ul><li>Bachelor’s degree in Data Analytics, Data Science, or similar.</li><li>Minimum of five years’ experience working with structured and non-structured data to deliver business intelligence.</li><li>Proven track record of developing dashboards and reports to meet business needs.</li><li>Hands on experience working with Business Intelligence software to meet operational needs and visualize strategic growth opportunities to management.</li><li>Extensive experience with databases.</li><li>Prior application of data and reporting integrity and sustainability.</li><li>&nbsp;</li></ul><p><strong>Preferred Competencies:</strong></p><p>&nbsp;</p><ul><li>eCommerce platforms (ideally Magento)</li><li>Google Analytics</li><li>Netsuite</li><li>PowerBI</li><li>QuickBase</li><li>SQL Server</li><li>Python or R</li></ul><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Machine Learning/ Artificial Intelligence is a plus</p>
